column4: Anyone know how to get a linksys Wireless G PCI Adapter model WMP54G working on Feisty?  It uses a passcode that isn't typical for most wireless networks.
I would change the WEP...
What kind of WEP security does your router use?
WPA Personal is what what says?  Your Network manager, or your routr?
I'm not sure the XP program that came with the wireless card says that its WPA Personal under security
Nevermind what XP Says.  What kind of securtiy do you have setup on your router?
well there was none until I set up the wireless card on my system.  I also use the WPA Personal to use my PSP on the same network
WPA Peronsal is Wi-Fi, I believe
How many groups of characters is your password?
What Network Manager are you using to connect?
Getting Feisty to work with a Wireless G PCI Adapter model WMP54G
I can't find passcode right now....  I'll keep searching
Okay.  I think for WPA Personal, you mgiht want to try wlassistant.
will I be able to get it without access to the network though?
I'm not sure what you're asking.  I'm pretty sure wlassistant uses WPA Personal.. it's for wifi..
sudo apt-get install wlassistant
alright I'll try it but I would think I would need the internet to get it ya?
yes.  you will.
Just download the source file, and install it.. it's not a big application
Thanks!!  You helped me out alot
np man.  good luck.
